post:
Hey again! Our new nodes are ready in our new location, this time in Equinix TY8 Tokyo, Japan.

We are back with new nodes having the following config, we started using SSD's in RAID 10 instead of enterprise SATA Drives, we guarantee blazing fast service, support and performance.

2x Xeon(R) Intel(R) CPU E5-2650, 256 GB ECC Reg Memory DDR3, 8x Intel S3520 Intel DC SSDs (RAID 10), 2 HE Chassis.

You can find all our plans at [here](https://billing.rootnerds.com/cart.php?gid=31)

Also check out our re-seller offers for the same price/vps: http://www.rootnerds.com/vps~reseller

Promotional Pricing is available on the below plan right now:

**myVPS M:**  5.49 €/Month (recurring) - [Order](https://billing.rootnerds.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=216) - No Setup Fee - Instant Setup 1 GB RAM 50 GB HDD 200 GB Traffic 1 Core - up to 3,9 GHz 1 IPv4 included(IPv6 connectivity will be up in a week)


All VPS are virtualized using OpenVZ.

Contact/Support Of course, here in this thread. Mail: support [AT] rootnerds.com

We also sell Dedicated servers on request at almost all major cities across EU, India, NZ, AU, Japan and the US.

Please put in a ticket for inquiries of dedicated servers at sales [AT] rootnerds.com

Sincerely, Saket Kale https://rootnerds.com
